course_title: Interpretation of the New Testament II
class_notes: (THIS COURSE IS FULL.  Contact candlerregistrar@eomry.edu to be placed on the waiting list)(Prerequisite: NT 501 or equivalent; ONLINE: ASYNCHRONOUS)
course_description:
An introduction to the practice and theory of interpreting the New Testament, which
emphasizes the development of exegetical skills through the writing of papers, the reading of secondary literature, and engagement with diverse hermeneutical
approaches.
.
prerequisites: NT 501 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5335, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: W. Wilson, Status: Closed
